titles.title: Export Working Capital Loan Improvement Act of 2000
To amend the Small Business Act to permit the sale of guaranteed loans made for export purposes before the loans have been fully disbursed to borrowers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Small Business. H. Rept. 106-880.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 531.

action.text: Mr. Manzullo moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4944.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 7/25/2000--Introduced. Export Working Capital Loan Improvement Act of 2000 - Amends the Small Business Act to authorize the sale of guaranteed loans made to small businesses for export purposes before such loans have been fully disbursed to borrowers.
